snippet.title: Gnarly Hike | Full Release Trailer (STEAM 2024)
snippet.description:
#horrorgaming #indiegame #gnarlyhike #5peakspublishing #steamgame #wildcardgames 
Gnarly Hike | Full Release Trailer (STEAM 2024)
.
.
.
*About The Game
Gnarly Hike is a first-person psychological horror game. 

Explore an eerie forest in a slow-paced, atmospheric world combining beautiful and horrifying scenery along with the constant fear of being hunted, and enjoy a genuinely terrifying experience. Uncover secrets, expel spirits and ...stay alive!

Gnarly Hike is developed by Wildcard Games and published by 5Peaks Publishing.

Game Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2666390/Gnarly_Hike/ 
--------------------
#gnarlyhike  #horrorgaming #indiegame #gameplay #nocommentary #playthrough #5peakspublishing #longplay #walkthrough #horrorgames #horrorgame #horrorgameplay
